title: "Meet the Cochrane farmer with a robotic dairy farm"
excerpt: "Robots have invaded Adrian Struyk’s dairy farm, and he couldn’t be happier. Struyk runs the 1,250-acre farm, just north of Cochrane, alongside his wife Margaret and two sons, producing milk, haylage, canola, oats and wheat. The family also does custom work on an additional 2,000 acres."
